recipes.name: Poached egg & avocado breakfast salad
recipes.instructions: -Poach the eggs. -Create the salads by layering the lettuce, tomatoes, cooked quinoa, avocado, and pistachios. - Add the poached eggs and top with salt/pepper to taste.
recipes.list: 2 eggs (fresh), 1 avocado, 7 grape tomatoes, 2 cups lettuce, 1/4 cup cooked quinoa, 1 Tbsp pistachios, salt/pepper
